El curso fue un punto de inflexión para: The course was a turning point for daring to do things differently: with more confidence and more quality. A year after the course, we have noticed a significant improvement in the code and the methodologies we apply.
Una formación imprescindible para enfren: An essential training to face that great monster known as legacy code. With training like this, it's impossible not to be passionate about our work.

Por nuestra experiencia como profesores,: From our experience as teachers, developers, and entrepreneurs, we understand the challenges of software development. ¿Cuál es el nivel del curso?: What is the level of the course?
El nivel del curso es intermedio. Está d: The course level is intermediate. It is aimed at people who program professionally.

Este curso lo aprovecharán menos aquella: This course will be less beneficial for those with good knowledge of object-oriented programming, clean code, and who write automated unit tests daily.

Juntar a todo el equipo, además de gener: Bringing the whole team together, in addition to generating team building, allows people who usually don't work together to collaborate.
Durante el transcurso de los días, fomen: Throughout the days, we encourage dialogue and debates among the team, which help align their vision.
Nada mejor que dos días formación para m: Nothing better than two days of training to motivate the team.
El curso se compone de <a href=\"#traini: The course consists of several blocks of two hours.
Cada bloque empieza con una breve introd: Each block starts with a brief theoretical introduction.
Le sigue un ejercicio que se realiza en: This is followed by an exercise done in pairs where they put into practice what was covered in the theoretical part while the trainers provide constant feedback to the participants.
El bloque termina con un debate de grupo: The block ends with a group debate, where the participants share what they have learned and we have discussions all together.
¿Puedo apuntarme yo solo?: Can I sign up by myself?
El curso está diseñado para impartirse e: The course is designed to be delivered in companies.
También ofrecemos cursos en abierto dond: We also offer open courses where anyone can sign up.
<a href=\"#contactForm\">Inscríbete</a>: Sign up and we will inform you about the upcoming courses near you.
Tan solo es necesario traer un ordenador: You only need to bring a computer with the development tools that each person uses installed. Ideally, the course should be taken on the same machines that the team uses in their day to day and Docker.
En presencial hace falta una sala con pr: In person, a room with a projector or a large screen and a whiteboard for writing is needed. The ideal setup is to have a computer with two screens, two keyboards, and two mice for every two people.
En remoto hace falta un micrófono, auric: Remotely, a microphone, headphones, and webcam are needed for each participant.
Los ejercicios realizados en el curso so: The exercises done in the course are specific for learning one concept at a time.
Durante nuestro día a día nos enfrentamo: During our day-to-day, we face much more complex problems and with code in worse condition.
Por ello, después del curso, ofrecemos a: Therefore, after the course, we offer support to your company to help in transforming your legacy into something maintainable.
La mejor forma de obtener más informació: The best way to get more information is by talking to us. Fill out this form or send an email to info@codium.team and let's find a time to talk.
Curso de TDD - Test Driven Development -: TDD Training - Test-Driven Development - Codium Team
Aprende a escribir código simple, robust: Learn to write simple, robust, and flexible code by applying TDD: Test Driven Development. A practical, fun, and intense course.
Learn to write simple, robust, and flexible code from tests. Practical, fun, and intense course.
Learn to write simple, robust, and flexible code from tests
Aunque conocía TDD a nivel teórico, desp: Although I knew TDD theoretically, it was after taking this course that I understood how to incorporate it into my daily life.
Software Architect en Brújula Tecnología: Software Architect at Brújula Tecnologías de la Información
El curso ha sido un buen punto de inflex: The course has been a good turning point to start using TDD in my daily life and to deepen my understanding of everything learned. The katas guided by the Codium team add a lot of value to the course and are very well chosen to highlight the mistakes that are often made when starting with TDD.
Gracias a los ejercicios propuestos y a: Thanks to the proposed exercises and the instructors, this course has equipped me with theoretical knowledge, as well as practical strategies, that now allow me to identify and solve the problems I face in my day-to-day when doing TDD.
El valor del curso explicado con bueno-b: The value of the course explained with good-nice-cheap
El simple hecho de pensar y escribir un: The simple act of thinking and writing a test before the production code represents a paradigm shift in software development and an unimaginable leap in the quality of your code.
TDD son las siglas de Test Driven Develo: TDD stands for Test Driven Development.
Es una metodología de desarrollo. Esta m: It is a development methodology. This methodology is not based on performing a huge battery of tests and then writing the code, but rather on conducting small testing cycles and simultaneously writing the necessary code to turn the test green.
Una vez lo tenemos en verde, quitar dupl: Once we have it green, remove duplication and refactor. This cycle is known as RED · GREEN · REFACTOR
Puedes leer <a href=\"https://blog.codiu: You can read more about TDD on our blog.
También puede interesarte el post sobre: You might also be interested in the post about how to apply TDD in the front end with React JS.
Al reducir el testeo manual de la aplica: By reducing manual testing of the application
Al poder cambiar fácilmente decisiones q: By being able to easily change decisions that are no longer valid
Tipos de tests y costes asociados: Types of tests and associated costs
Contexto de TDD y Test smells: Context of TDD and test smells
Cómo y cuándo usarlos: How and when to use them
Tipos de dobles: mock, spy, stub, fake y: Types of doubles: mock, spy, stub, fake, and dummy
A equipos que hacen tests y quieren dar: To teams that conduct tests and want to make a quality leap.
A empresas que quieren tomarse en serio: To companies that want to take quality seriously and continue adding functionality at a good pace.
A programadores familiarizados con el te: To programmers familiar with testing and good development practices.
El curso se centra en cómo testear la ló: The course focuses on how to test business logic, regardless of where it is located, whether in the back-end, front-end, or mobile. QA personnel can also benefit from the course by understanding the development process and helping to write better tests.
El nivel del curso es avanzado. Está dir: The course level is advanced. It is aimed at people who write tests frequently.
Es un curso introductorio a Test-Driven: It is an introductory course to Test-Driven Development. The TDD course is intensive and we cover everything from the most basic parts, such as unit tests, to more complex topics, like the different types of test doubles and common issues when writing tests.
Al ser un curso muy práctico y con mucho: Being a very practical course with a lot of debate, it allows us to adapt to the level of the attendees. If you already know something about TDD, during the course you will deepen your knowledge and learn more advanced strategies.
Este no es un curso diseñado para person: This is not a course designed for people who apply Test-Driven Development in their day-to-day, systematically writing unit tests before writing the code.
El bloque termina con un debate de grupo: The block ends with a group debate, where the participants share what they have learned and we have discussions all together
Los ejercicios realizados en el curso so: The exercises done in the course are specific for learning one concept at a time. During our day to day, we face much more complex problems and with poorly maintained code.
Por ello, después del curso, ofrecemos a: Therefore, after the course, we offer support to help you implement Test-Driven Development in your project.
Pragmático, directo, en la misma línea d: Pragmatic, direct, in line with the very  philosophy of TDD. It has helped me develop in a safer and cleaner way, discovering at the same time other ways to do TDD that I was unaware of, always guided by very powerful exercises.

Curso Refactoring a Patrones - Patrones: Refactoring to Patterns training - Design Patterns
Mejora el diseño de tu código: Improve the design of your code
Un curso esencial para todas las persona: An essential course for everyone who values code quality and maintainability. It has given me the opportunity to optimize daily development processes and be more efficient. The conversations that arose during it have been extremely enriching.
Principal Development Consultant en Lean: Principal Development Consultant at Lean Mind
En 4 días hemos aprendido y practicado m: In 4 days we have learned and practiced more than 15 patterns. I loved the experience of applying each pattern, keeping the tests green and utilizing the power of the IDE. But above all, I am left with the feeling of having evolved a lot.
El curso es muy fácil de seguir y el amb: The course is very easy to follow and the environment is very collaborative. By working in rotating pairs, I have learned a ton of tricks. For me, refactoring is a technique that gives you the superpower to make your code malleable and the peace of mind to postpone decisions.
Menudo workshop sobre refactoring más es: What a spectacular workshop on refactoring, I had a great time. The atmosphere, the people, the content, and especially the way it was handled. I highly recommend it!
Aporta una serie de herramientas que pue: It provides a series of tools that you can apply from the first day, making it a very dynamic course in participation. Thanks to Codium for the respectful support to try, implement, and discuss the solutions.
El curso es una muy buena forma de apren: The course is a very good way to learn design patterns from a practical approach. It's easy to fall into overengineering when learning patterns from a blank sheet: instead, you'll see how patterns solve some of the problems in the code.
Los patrones de diseño son <strong>buena: Design patterns are good solutions to recurring problems in software design. By using design patterns, you can create more flexible, maintainable, and reusable code.
Buscar una nueva solución a los mismos p: Finding a new solution to the same problems reduces your effectiveness as a developer, as a lot of time is invested in the process. Knowing solutions that work and applying them will save us a lot of headaches.
Los patrones de diseño no solo brindan e: Design patterns not only provide standardization to the code, but also ensure that the code follows good programming principles, such as low coupling and high cohesion or the DRY principle (don't repeat yourself).
Al llegar a los patrones a partir del <s: By arriving at patterns from the refactor, it allows us to work on the problem before the solution.
Para aquellas personas que no están acos: For those who are not used to having a good suite of tests, it can be a transformative experience to see the security we gain from them.
Aprenderás cómo sacar el máximo partido: You will learn how to make the most of the IDE to refactor safely and efficiently, reducing errors and increasing development speed.
Conocer los patrones nos permite no rein: Knowing the patterns allows us not to reinvent the wheel and to build more flexible and robust solutions by combining them.
Saber los nombres de los patrones nos pe: Knowing the names of the patterns allows us to communicate complex ideas precisely and effectively.
<strong>Value Objects</strong>: Eliminar: Value Objects: Eliminate duplicate code and increase cohesion.
<strong>Shared setup method</strong> y <: Shared setup method and Test creation method: Reduce duplication in tests.
<strong>Builder y builders de test</stro: Builder and test builders: : Build test data while reducing noise.
<strong>First Class Collection</strong>:: First Class Collection: Group logic into data sets.
<strong>Null Object</strong>: Elimina co: Null Object: Removes checks if not null.
<strong>Adaptador</strong>: Desacopla la: Adapter: Decouples business logic from implementation details.
<strong>Cadena de responsabilidad</stron: Chain of Responsibility: Decides who processes a request and/or processes an action in parts.
<strong>Observer</strong>: Extiende el c: Observer: Extends behavior by notifying others, who will react accordingly.
<strong>Publisher/Subscriber</strong>: E: Publisher/Subscriber: It evolves the observer, launching events that can be processed asynchronously.

Me ha gustado mucho el formato de curso: I really liked the course format you have designed and how you teach it. I think it's right that the course is divided into a practical part and a theoretical one. For someone who has never seen anything about Docker or who doesn't have the concepts clear, it's very helpful.
No tenía ninguna experiencia con Docker: I had no experience with Docker and the course has helped me a lot to understand what it is, how it works, and learn to use it in a clear and concise way..
El curso de Docker me ha servido para re: The Docker course has helped me refresh and solidify both basic and advanced concepts about using Docker. Being a hands-on training, I have been able to integrate this new knowledge into my daily routine without problems.
Un curso bien organizado que ha servido: A well-organized course that has helped to reinforce and expand our basic knowledge of Docker to be able to get more out of it in our daily lives.
Docker soluciona algunos de los problema: Docker solves some of the most common infrastructure problems, almost allowing us to eliminate the famous "it works on my machine".
¿Pero cómo? Tratando la infraestructura: But how? By treating infrastructure as code, automating processes, and encapsulating applications along with all their dependencies.
Problemas comunes que Docker nos ayuda a: Common problems that Docker helps us solve:
Los desarrolladores tienen máquinas dist: Developers have different machines with diverse operating systems.
Diferentes versiones del software en ent: Different versions of software in local, test, and production environments, making it difficult to reproduce certain problems because the environments are different.
Diferentes versiones instaladas de libre: Different installed versions of libraries and packages.
A medida que el tiempo pasa el conocimie: As time goes by, knowledge about the software is lost, easily causing the installation of the software to be complex and manual.
Sobrecostes por infrautilización de los: Overcosts due to underutilization of the resources of the servers or virtual machines.
Despliegues manuales: un miembro del equ: Manual deployments: a team member must connect to a server and configure or upload a binary/artifact manually, etc.
Sysadmins tardan tiempo en desplegar, es: Sysadmins take time to deploy, it's complicated to make changes in the infrastructure or simply scale.

Las pruebas manuales son tediosas, lenta: Manual testing is tedious, slow, and unreliable. In this course, you will learn to automate the verification processes of applications or web pages using tools like Cypress or Selenium quickly and with almost no coding.
Al automatizar las pruebas manuales, se: By automating manual tests, they can be executed much more quickly, significantly reducing the time needed to get feedback.
Las pruebas repetitivas y monótonas se p: Repetitive and monotonous tests can be executed automatically, allowing QA teams to focus on more complex and valuable testing.
Es muy sencillo ejecutar las mismas prue: It is very easy to run the same tests on different platforms, browsers, and devices. This allows for greater test coverage and better error detection.
Se pueden ejecutar pruebas de manera aut: Tests can be run automatically after each code change, allowing for quick error detection, preventing them from reaching production, and improving the developer experience.
Gracias a todos los beneficios mencionad: Thanks to all the aforementioned benefits, costs are reduced, application quality is increased, and customer satisfaction is enhanced.
Introducción a la automatización de proc: Introduction to process automation. How to record and execute manual steps.
Mejorando la calidad de nuestros tests: Improving the quality of our tests
Desacoplarnos del markup utilizando sele: Decoupling from markup using accessibility selectors with Testing-library.
Definir y usar comandos custom en Cypres: Defining and using custom commands in Cypress.
Reducir la duplicidad con los hooks befo: Reducing duplication with beforeEach, afterEach, before, and after hooks.
Beneficios de probar en diferentes naveg: Benefits of testing in different browsers and devices.
Cómo ejecutar los tests en diferentes na: How to run tests in different browsers.
Cómo simular diferentes resoluciones y d: How to simulate different resolutions and devices.
¿Qué es y para qué se utiliza?: What it is and what it is used for?
Qué son y para qué sirven los Stubs y Sp: What Stubs and Spies are and what they are used for
BDD y la importancia del uso de un lengu: BDD and the importance of using a common language.
Exploraremos los problemas más conocidos: We will explore the most common issues when testing a web application
Aprenderemos a utilizar herramientas y t: We will learn to use tools and techniques to address these issues and ensure the quality of the application.
Cómo <strong>grabar y ejecutar </strong>: How to record and run manual steps
<strong>Introducción a BDD</strong> con: Introduction to BDD with Cucumber and Cypress
Es un curso introductorio al testing aut: It is an introductory course to automated testing. The course is intensive and we cover everything from the most basic parts, such as unit tests, to more complex topics, such as the different types of test doubles and common issues when writing tests.
Al ser un curso muy práctico y con mucho: As it is a very practical course with a lot of debate, it allows us to adapt to the level of the attendees. If you already know something about testing, during the course you will deepen your knowledge and learn more advanced strategies.
Actualmente se puede bonificar 156 € por: Currently, a subsidy of €156 per student can be obtained.
Por ello, después del curso, ofrecemos a: Therefore, after the course, we offer support to help you implement automated testing in your project.
Este curso es para ti si:: This course is for you if
Eres tester o desarrollador y haces prue: You are a tester or developer and perform manual testing.
Deseas introducir buenas prácticas a tus: You want to introduce good practices to your tests.
Conoces el proceso de desarrollo y quier: You understand the development process and want to help write better tests.
Pone foco en transmitir una buena mental: It focuses on conveying a good mindset, knowing the tools to be productive, writing maintainable and well-tested code, and how to be a good product developer.
Js, Java, Python, PHP o C#: Js, Java, Python, PHP or C#
¿Estás cansado de que estos problemas te: Are you tired of these problems holding you back?
Las entregas de nuevas funcionalidades s: New feature deliveries are always delayed.
El código legacy se interpone en el cami: Legacy code stands in the way of innovation.
Las incidencias en producción queman a t: Production incidents burn out your team and your customers.
La falta de crecimiento técnico de tu eq: The lack of technical growth in your team hinders progress and company competitiveness.
Un programa de aceleración del talento p: A talent acceleration program allows for improving the skill level and productivity of new hires and existing staff. This enables hiring people and training them to achieve maximum performance.
Ahorra un tiempo valioso de otros compañ: Saves valuable time for other colleagues, as the adaptation phase is shorter.
Facilita la contratación de nuevos compa: Facilitates the hiring of new colleagues by betting on people with less experience and training them. This has a positive impact on the company's image and employee satisfaction.
El Programa de Aceleración es un program: The Acceleration Program is a 3-month intensive preparation through theoretical and practical training alongside experienced professionals in various topics. The training focuses on instilling a good mindset, knowing the tools to be productive, writing maintainable and well-tested code, and how to be a good product developer.
Conocer las herramientas que te hacen pr: Know the tools that make you productive.
Conocer las herramientas que te permiten: Know the tools that allow you to automate repetitive processes.
Escribir código fácil de entender y mant: Write code that is easy to understand and maintain.
Cómo crear una buena arquitectura: How to create a good architecture
Escribir buenos tests de diferentes tipo: Write good tests of different types.
Comprender las propiedades, beneficios d: Understand the properties, benefits of creating tests.
Entender los costes de cada tipo de test: Understand the costs of each type of test.
Entender que lo más importante es el val: Understand that the most important thing is the value provided.
Centrarnos en el problema a resolver, có: Focus on the problem to be solved, how it impacts the user, how to provide value upfront, and how to simplify the product.
El temario está organizado en temáticas: The syllabus is organized into topics
Practicamos con ejercicios aislados con: We practice with isolated exercises aimed at distilling the essence of the practices and concepts.
Desarrollamos un proyecto simple aplican: We develop a simple project applying TDD, design patterns, and automating the infrastructure.
Partiendo de un proyecto legacy, testear: Starting from a legacy project, testing it, improving its design by refactoring while always keeping the tests green.
Trabajamos lo más parecido a lo que será: We work as closely as possible to what your day-to-day will be like when you join a team.
No. El programa está diseñado para impar: No. The program is designed to be delivered in companies.
Los grupos idealmente son de entre 4 y 6: The groups ideally consist of 4 to 6 people, with a maximum of 8.
¿Pueden asistir personas que no saben pr: Can people who don't know how to program attend?
No. Este programa está diseñado para per: No. This program is designed for people with programming knowledge. They should have programmed for at least several months and ideally a few years.
¿Pueden asistir personas con varios años: Can people with several years of experience attend?
Yes, in fact, it is very interesting.
En el programa tratamos temas de patrone: In the program, we cover topics such as design patterns, testing, refactoring, agile mindset, and product vision in great depth.
¿Cómo es la experiencia de aprendizaje d: What is the learning experience of the program like?
El programa es a tiempo completo, estand: The program is full-time, with most of the time spent together and a couple of hours for each student to delve deeper or reinforce what they've learned on their own.
Aprenderemos programando en grupo foment: We will learn by programming in groups, encouraging discussions and exploring the reasons, facilitated and supported by a Codium teacher.
Es necesario que todos los alumnos tenga: It is necessary for all students to have a computer, a good internet connection, a webcam, a microphone, and a quiet environment.
Estamos especializados en TDD, código le: Specialized in TDD, legacy code, design patterns, and product engineering.
Convertimos <span class=\"text-logo-colo: We transform technical teams into innovation engines that drive your growth.
Con años de experiencia técnica, formamo: With years of technical experience, we train your team with proven and results-oriented methodologies.
Podemos integrarnos dentro de tu equipo: We can integrate within your team or work autonomously. We design, build, and launch new features quickly and with the quality you expect.
Necesito potenciar mi equipo: I need to empower my team
Invierte en el activo más valioso de tu: Invest in your company's most valuable asset: your people. Through training and mentoring programs, we increase your team's productivity, code quality, and autonomy.
